arStrings.szText: {c_important}Thunderspike{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} additional Vigor if you have moved in the last {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
When you {c_important}Evade{/c}, you attack with {c_important}Thunderspike{/c} along the way and make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Thunderspike's{/c} {c_number}3rd{/c} attack strikes back again, Pulling in and Knocking Down Distant enemies for {c_number}[{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}|1|]{/c} seconds.
